text: Patrick Schnieder (born 1 May 1968) is a German lawyer and politician of the Christian Democratic Union (CDU). He has been a member of the Bundestag from the state of Rhineland-Palatinate since 2009. In 2025, he became Minister of Transport. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Bundestag biography Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Transport ministers of Germany Category:Politicians of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany Category:Politicians from Rhineland-Palatinate
title: Patrick Schnieder
